name: Association of Commercial Television in Europe
memberOrga: We enclose our website link which lists our members in detail, http://acte.be/about-us/act-members.
goal:
Our statutory objective is to promote co-operation among our member companies and with other enterprises active in audiovisual media, relating to ethics, the regulatory environment, programming, production and financing.

Inter alia, we facilitate the development of joint positions on matters of common interest vis-à-vis the EU institutions.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives:
Our priority issues are:
- Digital Single Market,
- Copyright Directive, SatCab regulation
- regulation of media content (especially Audiovisual Media Services directive),
- e-privacy,
- fake news
- regulation of advertising,
- E-commerce Directive,
- EU Data protection.
